commit message:
fixes Bug with filtered List

the wrong item was selected if the list was filtered and an item got
clicked

Many fixes!

Fix the null pointer exception where mTts is null
Fix the threading so that speak() is always called in a thread
Update the deprecated onUtteranceCompletedListener to an UtteranceProgressListener
Add onCreate method to save the compute time of recreating the mTts object on every batch of messages
Add a thread-safe queue to properly ensure shake/audio focus handling with multiple asynchronous calls to speak()

Switch back to onUtteranceCompletedListener

36% of the userbase is worth keeping

Merge pull request #18 from ScottAlbertine/master

Many fixes!

Merge pull request #16 from 1karu5/master

fixes Bug with filtered List

Fix crash at launch for API 7 (2.1) and earlier.

-Audio focus was added in API 8.
-Option is removed when not supported.

Fix status showing suspended when disabled after suspending.

-Clicking status in this situation did nothing.
-Only an issue when widget is used since only widget can suspend.
Mention that Wallet Send Money is only for US, bump version.
